GenAiFunction.description:
Get context information about the current user and org environment.
USAGE GUIDELINES: Context Properties: - baseUrlForLinks: For constructing clickable Salesforce URLs - orgId: 15-character org identifier - userId: 18-character user identifier - userDateTime: ISO8601 format in user's timezone - userEmail: User's email address - userFirstName: User's first name - userLanguage: Locale code (e.g., en_US) - userLastName: User's last name - userTimezone: User's timezone identifier
Technical Details: - All fields respect field-level security - Timezone conversions handled automatically - Links use correct instance URL - Language code follows ISO standards - Name fields respect local name formats - Org ID uses 15-char version for compatibility - URLs include Lightning/Classic detection - Context persists across API operations - Used for permission checking
